PF2E_ALCHEMIST_REMASTER_DUCTTAPE.NOTIF_ALREADY_MAX_VIALS: {actorname} already has the maximum number of versatile vials.
PF2E_ALCHEMIST_REMASTER_DUCTTAPE.NOTIF_SELECT_TOKEN_FIRST: Please select a token or assign a character first.
PF2E_ALCHEMIST_REMASTER_DUCTTAPE.NOTIF_ITEM_NOT_WEAPON: The item is not a weapon.
PF2E_ALCHEMIST_REMASTER_DUCTTAPE.NOTIF_NO_VIAL_CONSUME: No versatile vials available to consume.
PF2E_ALCHEMIST_REMASTER_DUCTTAPE.NOTIF_FAIL_ATK_TEMP_POISONED_WPN: Failed to perform the attack roll with the temporary poisoned weapon.
PF2E_ALCHEMIST_REMASTER_DUCTTAPE.NOTIF_NO_PERMS: You do not have permission to modify this actor.
PF2E_ALCHEMIST_REMASTER_DUCTTAPE.SETTING_COMPENDIUM_ALREADY_IN_LIST: Compendium '{input}' is already in the list.
PF2E_ALCHEMIST_REMASTER_DUCTTAPE.SETTING_COMPENDIUM_INVALID: Compendium '{input}' is not valid or does not contain items.
PF2E_ALCHEMIST_REMASTER_DUCTTAPE.SETTING_COMPENDIUM_LIST_INVALID: The following compendiums were not valid or were duplicates and were not saved:
PF2E_ALCHEMIST_REMASTER_DUCTTAPE.SETTING_REMOVE_TEMP_START_TURN: Quick Alchemy: remove temporary items at start of turn?
PF2E_ALCHEMIST_REMASTER_DUCTTAPE.SETTING_REMOVE_TEMP_END_COMBAT: Quick Alchemy: remove temporary items at end of combat?
PF2E_ALCHEMIST_REMASTER_DUCTTAPE.SETTING_SEND_CHAT_REMOVE_TEMP: Quick Alchemy: Send chat message when removing temp quick alchemy items?
PF2E_ALCHEMIST_REMASTER_DUCTTAPE.SETTING_SEND_CRAFTED_ITEM_TO_CHAT: Quick Alchemy: Send all crafted items to chat?
PF2E_ALCHEMIST_REMASTER_DUCTTAPE.SETTING_SEND_CRAFTED_ITEM_TO_CHAT_HINT: If enabled, will send an item card to chat for all items made with Quick Alchemy, even the items made choosing 'Craft and attack'.
PF2E_ALCHEMIST_REMASTER_DUCTTAPE.SETTING_SIZEBASED_ALCHEMY_HINT: Adjust the size of items created by Quick Alchemy to match the creature's size.
PF2E_ALCHEMIST_REMASTER_DUCTTAPE.SETTING_ENABLE_POWERFUL_ALCHEMY_HINT: Enables the auto-update of created items using Class DC.
PF2E_ALCHEMIST_REMASTER_DUCTTAPE.SETTING_LEVELUP_ADD_HIGHER: Level Up: Add higher level version of known formulas upon level up.
PF2E_ALCHEMIST_REMASTER_DUCTTAPE.SETTING_LEVELUP_ADD_HIGHER_HINT: If enabled, when leveled up will add higher level version of known formulas.Ask for each = will prompt for each formula; Ask for all = will prompt for all formulas at once; Auto = will automatically add formulas.
PF2E_ALCHEMIST_REMASTER_DUCTTAPE.SETTING_LEVELUP_HANDLE_LOWER_LEVEL: Level Up: Lower level formula handling:
PF2E_ALCHEMIST_REMASTER_DUCTTAPE.SETTING_LEVELUP_HANDLE_LOWER_LEVEL_HINT: Upon level up, will check for available lower level formulas, or remove them to keep your formula list small. Add lower level versions = Will add lower level versions of known formulas; Remove lower level versions (default) = Will Remove lower level formulas if a higher level is known.
PF2E_ALCHEMIST_REMASTER_DUCTTAPE.SETTING_LEVELUP_PROMPT_REMOVE_LOWER_LEVE: Level Up: Prompt setting for lower level forumulas
'Auto': Automatically removes lower level formulas, 'Ask for All': ask once for all, 'Ask for Each': Ask for each formula
PF2E_ALCHEMIST_REMASTER_DUCTTAPE.SETTING_LEVELUP_PERMISSION_LEVEL: Level Up: Permission level to add/remove formulas to actor:
PF2E_ALCHEMIST_REMASTER_DUCTTAPE.SETTING_LEVELUP_PERMISSION_LEVEL_HINT: (If actor owner is not logged in, GM will be prompted)
PF2E_ALCHEMIST_REMASTER_DUCTTAPE.SETTING_LEVELUP_SEND_NEW_REMOVED_TO_CHAT: Level Up: Add the list of new/removed formulas upon level up to chat.
PF2E_ALCHEMIST_REMASTER_DUCTTAPE.SETTING_ADD_COMPENDIUM_HINT: Manage the list of compendiums checked during level up.
PF2E_ALCHEMIST_REMASTER_DUCTTAPE.SETTING_VIAL_SEARCH_REMINDER_HINT: When at least 10 minutes in game time pass out of combat, prompt alchemist to add vials.
PF2E_ALCHEMIST_REMASTER_DUCTTAPE.SETTING_DISPLAY_MAX_VIAL: Display when alchemist has max vials already
PF2E_ALCHEMIST_REMASTER_DUCTTAPE.SETTING_DISPLAY_MAX_VIAL_HINT: Enable/Disable max vials messages in chat.
PF2E_ALCHEMIST_REMASTER_DUCTTAPE.SETTING_ENABLE_FORMULA_SEARCH_HINT: Enables the search/filter for formulas on character sheet.
PF2E_ALCHEMIST_REMASTER_DUCTTAPE.SETTING_COLLAPSE_ITEM_DESC_CHAT_HINT: Shortens chat messages with long item descriptions, click the Eye icon to expand.
PF2E_ALCHEMIST_REMASTER_DUCTTAPE.SETTING_DISABLED_WORKBENCH: This setting is disabled because xdy-pf2e-workbench is managing collapsible content.
PF2E_ALCHEMIST_REMASTER_DUCTTAPE.SETTING_DEBUG_LEVEL_HINT: Set the debug level for logging. None disables all logging, All includes info, warnings, and errors.
PF2E_ALCHEMIST_REMASTER_DUCTTAPE.SETTING_COMPENDIUM_CHECK_HINT: List of compendiums to search for higher-level items when characters level up.
PF2E_ALCHEMIST_REMASTER_DUCTTAPE.QUICK_ALCHEMY_PROMPT_TYPE: What type of item do you wish to craft with Quick Alchemy?
